news.title: Ludhiana: Property owners, councillor oppose demolition drive in Model Town
news.para: As the situation turned stormy, senior town planner Surinder Singh Bindra reached the spot in support of his staff. The councillor accused Bindra and his officials of encouraging encroachments in other parts of city.

news.title: Build rainwater harvesting in 15 days or pay Rs 20,000 fine: Chandrapur civic body
news.para: According to the new policy, property holders failing to set up rainwater harvesting facility will be penalized with fine of Rs20,000. This amount will be recovered as property tax arrears, civic officials said.

news.title: Panvel civic body to give Rs 6 lakh insurance to citizens who pay property tax regularly
news.para: The PCMC general body has also approved a proposal to provide financial aid through accidental insurance cover to property holders paying taxes on time.

news.title: Chandigarh civic body house passes resolution for property tax waiver in colonies
news.para: The move comes following the agenda moved by BJP municipal councillors which was supported by both opposition parties Congress and Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) during the house meeting.

news.title: Nashik civic body's rebate for prompt property tax payers yield results
news.para: The civic body has earned Rs 50 crore property tax so far since April 1 in the current fiscal. It is the highest property tax collection so far in the first two months of the financial year.

news.title: Allahabad HC directs Ajnara to deposit Rs 7 crore with YEIDA for Panorama project
news.para: Last month, the YEIDA cancelled the allotment of Panorama in Sector 22A over non-payment of dues to the tune of Rs 46.8 crore.

news.title: ABIL group chairman to be kept at CBI guest house till May 30
news.para: Bhosale was arrested on Thursday by the central probe agency in an alleged corruption case involving Yes Bank founder Rana Kapoor and Kapil Wadhawan of Dewan Housing Finance Corporation Ltd (DHFL).

news.title: Nirmal Infrastructure's director surrenders before Bombay HC to serve seven days in civil jail
news.para: He was taken into custody from the HC premises by an assistant police commissioner of Azad Maidan police station vacation bench Judge, Justice Madhav Jamdar directed the police to hand over Jain’s custody to the Superintendent of the Civil prison at Byculla in Mumbai.

news.title: Noida Authority to ask government to amend IBC for financial creditor status?
news.para: Earlier this month, the Supreme Court ruled that the authority would have the status of an operational creditor, not a financial one, in insolvency proceedings, based on the definition of each in the IBC.

news.title: Yes Bank's insolvency petition against Radius Infra admitted
news.para: The realty firm, as the corporate guarantor for loans raised by its operating group companies, owes nearly ₹700 crore to the bank. Radius Infra Holdings had guaranteed repayment of loans sanctioned to E-Commerce Magnum Solution and Raghuleela Builders by creating a pledge over shares.

news.title: Brookfield India REIT proposes to raise up to Rs 5,000 crore via sale of units
news.para: ​The board of directors of Brookprop Management Services Pvt Ltd, the manager of Brookfield India Real Estate Trust (Brookfield India REIT), at its meeting held on Friday approved "issuance of units of Brookfield India REIT for an aggregate amount not exceeding Rs 50,000 million..."

news.title: Indiabulls Real Estate posts net loss of Rs 59.80 crore in Jan-Mar quarter
news.para: Total income fell to Rs 272.49 crore in the fourth quarter of FY22 from Rs 759.50 crore in the corresponding period of the preceding fiscal.

news.title: DLF will not enter low-income housing segment: Rajiv Singh, chairman
news.para: Singh said the company would not pursue the opportunity in affordable housing, "strictly because it's a very construction intensive activity."

news.title: Puravankara posts Rs 20 crore loss in Q4 FY22
news.para: Total income also fell to Rs 320.12 crore in the period under review from Rs 340.44 crore in the corresponding period of the previous year.

news.title: Evergrande to sell project in eastern China for $200 million
news.para: Saddled with more than $300 billion in liabilities, Evergrande has been struggling to repay suppliers, creditors and complete projects.
